dealer.about: Pinnacle Truck & Trailer is a one-stop-shop for trucks, trailers, service, and parts located in La Vergne (Nashville), Tennessee. We specialize in truck and trailer sales throughout Tennessee, carrying equipment from trusted brands like XL Specialized Trailers, Transcraft, Benson, Extreme Trailers, Reitnouer, Fontaine, and Liddell. We have 6 service bays to handle repairs on Flatbeds, Drop Decks, Lowboys, Dry Vans, Reefers, and Car Haulers. We specialize in pre-emission trucks for the Owner Operator. Competitive financing rates available from a variety of lenders.

listings.title: Kenworth W900 Day Cab Custom Paint
listings.description: Kenworth W900 Day Cab with custom paint. Converted to day cab with new hood by Rush Peterbilt. Platinum overhaul with Cat parts less than 4,000 miles ago. New hood and seats.

listings.title: Peterbilt 379EXHD Sleeper Truck
listings.description: Pre-emission Peterbilt 379EXHD sleeper truck. Ideal for Owner Operators looking for reliable pre-emission trucks.

listings.description: Kenworth T660 available. Contact for details and pricing.

listings.title: 2025 BENSON 48' x 102" Aluminum Flatbed
listings.description: New Benson 48' x 102" aluminum flatbed trailer. Features air ride suspension. Payments as low as $1,266.54/month. 3 units available.

listings.title: BENSON 53' x 102" Aluminum Flatbed
listings.description: Benson 53' x 102" aluminum flatbed trailer. Standard concentrated load capacity of 52,000# in 4', 55,000# in 10' and evenly distributed load capacity of 105,000#.

listings.title: 2025 EXTREME TRAILERS 53' x 102" Drop Deck
listings.description: New 2025 Extreme Trailers 53' x 102" drop deck. Features: 11' top deck, 24" kingpin, 42' lower deck, 4 rows of J-track, coil package, 16 zinc sliding winches, Bridgestone tires, aluminum wheels, Meritor PSI inflation system. Empty weight: 11,763#
